title: Pig Cahmpion
body: There needs to be a pig champion.

replies.body: i agree call him Mr. Porkens
lmao, that more or less counts {{champion:113}}

Have you been spying on me?

Seriously. Me and a group of friends had a discussion about salted pork recently which ended in someone (*cough* me *cough*) asking if we were talking about pork or LoL.

Where did this come from and why is this happening *now*???
